titles.title: Student Credit Card Protection Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act, to prevent credit card issuers from taking unfair advantage of college students and their parents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S174-175)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
